alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett; Johnston; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sampson, southeastern Harnett, northeastern Cumberland and southwestern Johnston Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Godwin, or 9 miles northeast of Fayetteville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Dunn, Benson, Godwin, Erwin, Eastover, Wade, Falcon, Linden and Spivey`s Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
